title: Gameday metadata reflects current playhead of the video player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched a game from their tvOS app
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to the Gameday mode option on the video player
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will be able to see the Gameday metadata displayed

AND

+ The Gameday metadata will be the same as the playhead copy

title: Transport controls are available in player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched a game from their tvOS app
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to the Gameday mode option on the video player
custom_expected:
THEN

+ All transport controls are available for the user to access to navigate around the player

title: Metadata is view only and cannot be in focus
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched a game from their tvOS app
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ The user navigates to the Gameday mode option on the video player
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user can confirm that the metadata displayed cannot be in focus. The user can only view this copy on the Gameday option.

title: Video player in focus when Gameday is active
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched a game from their tvOS app
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to the Gameday mode option on the video player
custom_expected:
THEN 

+ Only the video player will be in focus when Gameday mode is active

title: Confirm only five most recent plays display in carousel below video player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched a game from their tvOS app
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to the Gameday mode option on the video player AND views the recent plays carousel below the video player
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will only see the five most recent plays available to watch

title: Video returns to fullscreen when pressing Menu/Back button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched a game from their tvOS app

AND 

+ The user is utilizing Gameday mode
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user presses the Menu/Back button on their Apple TV remote (or phone application)
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will exit Gameday mode and return to full-screen playback of the game

title: Menu/Back button returns user to video player when controls are enabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched a game from their tvOS app

AND 

+ The user is utilizing Gameday mode
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user is utilizing player controls on the video player (Gameday cannot be in focus)

AND

+ The user presses the Menu/Back button on their remote
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The player controls will disappear

AND 

+ Pressing the Menu/Back button again will return video back to full-screen

title: User returns to full-screen when selecting the Exit Gameday quick action button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched a game from their tvOS app

AND

+ The user is utilizing Gameday mode

AND 

+ The user has video controls up
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user taps the Exit Gameday quick action button on the video player
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The video will return to full-screen mode

title: Confirm Closed Captions and Exit Gameday quick action buttons are available
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user has launched a game from their tvOS app

AND

+ The user is utilizing Gameday mode
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user is viewing the player controls on the video player
custom_expected:
THEN 

+ The only quick action buttons that are available to be selected are Closed Captions (Enabled/Disabled) and Exit Gameday.

title: Confirm Picture-in-Picture quick action button is NOT available
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched a game from their tvOS app

AND 

+ The user is utilizing Gameday mode
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the player controls
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The PiP quick action button is NOT available
AND only CC and Exit Gameday can be utilized

title: Confirm innings markers will NOT appear on timeline once in Gameday mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is utilizing Gameday mode
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the timeline of the video player
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The inning markers will NOT be displayed unless the user exits out of Gameday mode

title: Confirm Details, Games, and Broadcast options DO NOT appear once in Gameday mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is utilizing Gameday mode
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the full video player experience
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will NOT be able to utilize a drop-down option that includes Details, Games, and Broadcast options

title: Confirm all remote gestures work as expected while in Gameday mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched a game from their tvOS app

AND

+ The user is utilizing Gameday mode
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user is pressing and selecting the video player in Gameday mode by utilizing their remote's gestures
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The buttons will work as expected
